banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: Why you need help finding your dream job
videoData.socialTitle: Why you need help finding your dream job

nodes.whoTheyAre: Seth Yelorda is an organizational development expert and leadership coach who has helped churches, schools, and businesses across the US to develop their vision, clarify their culture, and cultivate their people. He is finishing a Ph.D. in Organizational Psychology from Claremont Graduate University and works as a consultant for Kaiser Permanente and an adjunct professor for Azusa Pacific University. Seth has a passion for unlocking human potential and driving positive change to make a difference in this field.

videoData.description: Everybody has a dream job, but over 80 percent of Americans working today can't reach it, says P. Seth Yelorda. The organizational development expert asserts that, in the face of "quiet quitting" and "the Great Resignation," leaders need to flip the script. Everybody benefits when employees reach their goals, even the bottom line.
